name: Nitro
description: Nitro ($NITRO) is a decentralized meme coin built on the power of community and artificial intelligence. In an era where memes and humor drive cultural trends, Nitro blends the best of both worlds. Unlike traditional meme coins, Nitro is not just another speculative asset; it is a community-driven token where every decision is shaped by the collective will of the holders. Nitro gives power back to the people, allowing the community to directly influence its development and ensure that it remains a fun, dynamic, and sustainable project.
